comments.raw_text: I think we need some better definition of components for openwebapps.  I've no idea for example, if this includes the owa jetpack addon.
comments.text: I think we need some better definition of components for openwebapps.  I've no idea for example, if this includes the owa jetpack addon.

comments.author: onecyrenus@gmail.com
comments.creator: onecyrenus@gmail.com
comments.text:
Currently this just includes some of the javascript unit / integration tests inside the directory. 

site/tests/spec/*.html

Over time there is the possibility of adding OWA extension tests to the same project, or building a dependency tree across multiple projects. 

The primary focus of this is to get the javascript pieces under CI
